extendedInfo.description: Tip Calculator Widgets - Free is a convenient, easy-to-use tip calculator that allows you to calculate a gratuity without the need to open another app. By the time it takes to find and open an app, you could have already calculated your tip by using the widget! This app only includes a widget. After installed, the widget will allow you to enter your bill amount, tip percentage, and how many ways you would like to split the bill. The app is now compatible with lock screens on Android 4.2 as well as tablets* Reverse Tip Calculator coming soon to the free versionThe Full Version of Tip Calculator Widgets can now be downloaded on Google Play:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.tipwidget.eliteThe full version allows you to customize your widget background, currency, default tip, default split, and rounding preferences. The full version also includes 3 new and improved widgets to make tip calculating even easier!

reviews.title: Calculation
reviews.comment: Great app for does who want to get exact charge if you are on a budget
reviews.author: jonathan vega

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: Tip calculator do not work the widget does not come up on my phone so I give it a 1 star for now please fix the problem so I can put it on my phone. Thank you
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Nice app! Def convenient for tipping so you don\'t have to go through all the apps..beautiful design ..keep them coming! Smart response was the bomb

reviews.title: Finally a tip widget!!!
reviews.comment: Clean widget that is easy to use. If you have problems seeing the widget after you download it try restarting phone.
